# BlazyUI

> A Blazor component library wrapping DaisyUI v5 with Tailwind CSS v4. Provides 34+ strongly-typed components with full IntelliSense, EditForm validation integration, TailwindMerge for class conflict resolution, and programmatic Modal/Toast services.

## Documentation

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/README.md): Installation guide, usage examples, and component overview
- [CLAUDE.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/CLAUDE.md): AI instructions, architecture details, and development patterns

## Core Architecture

- [BlazyComponentBase](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/BlazyComponentBase.cs): Base class for non-input components (TwMerge, Class parameter, AdditionalAttributes)
- [BlazyInputBase](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/BlazyInputBase.cs): Base class for form inputs (EditForm validation, error styling)
- [ExpressionFormatter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/ExpressionFormatter.cs): Expression-based field name generation for form inputs
- [FieldIdGenerator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FieldIdGenerator.cs): Generates unique field IDs from expressions

## Services

- [IModalService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Modal/IModalService.cs): Modal dialog API (Show, Confirm, Alert methods)
- [IToastService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toast/IToastService.cs): Toast notification API (Success, Error, Info, Warning)
- [ServiceCollectionExtensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Extensions/ServiceCollectionExtensions.cs): AddBlazyUI() service registration

## Components - Layout

- [BlazyAccordion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Accordion/BlazyAccordion.razor): Collapsible content sections with expandable panels
- [BlazyCard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Card/BlazyCard.razor): Container with header, body, and action sections
- [BlazyCollapse](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Collapse/BlazyCollapse.razor): Single collapsible panel for show/hide content
- [BlazyDivider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Divider/BlazyDivider.razor): Visual separator between content sections
- [BlazyDrawer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Drawer/BlazyDrawer.razor): Off-canvas sidebar navigation panel
- [BlazyJoin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Join/BlazyJoin.razor): Group elements together with connected styling
- [BlazyNavBar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/NavBar/BlazyNavBar.razor): Top navigation bar with responsive layout
- [BlazyTabs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Tabs/BlazyTabs.razor): Tabbed content panels with multiple styles
- [BlazyTimeline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Timeline/BlazyTimeline.razor): Chronological event display


## Components - Form Inputs

- [BlazyCheckbox](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Checkbox/BlazyCheckbox.razor): Boolean input for forms with validation support
- [BlazyCheckboxGroup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/CheckboxGroup/BlazyCheckboxGroup.razor): Multi-selection checkbox group with items, layout, and validation
- [BlazyDateInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/DateInput/BlazyDateInput.razor): Date/time input supporting DateTime, DateOnly, TimeOnly types
- [BlazyFieldset](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Fieldset/BlazyFieldset.razor): Form field grouping with legend support
- [BlazyFieldValidator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FieldValidator/BlazyFieldValidator.razor): Validation message display for form fields
- [BlazyFileInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FileInput/BlazyFileInput.razor): File upload input with drag-and-drop
- [BlazyFormField](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FormField/BlazyFormField.razor): Complete form field with label, input, and validation
- [BlazyLabel](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Label/BlazyLabel.razor): Form field labels with required indicator
- [BlazyNumberInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/NumberInput/BlazyNumberInput.razor): Numeric input with validation support
- [BlazyRadio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Radio/BlazyRadio.razor): Single selection from radio button options
- [BlazyRange](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Range/BlazyRange.razor): Slider input for numeric range selection
- [BlazyRating](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Rating/BlazyRating.razor): Star rating input component
- [BlazySelect](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Select/BlazySelect.razor): Dropdown selection with validation support
- [BlazyTextarea](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Textarea/BlazyTextarea.razor): Multi-line text input with validation
- [BlazyTextInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/TextInput/BlazyTextInput.razor): Text, email, password inputs with validation
- [BlazyToggle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toggle/BlazyToggle.razor): Switch/toggle input for boolean values


## Components - Visual/Feedback

- [BlazyAlert](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Alert/BlazyAlert.razor): Contextual feedback messages with color variants
- [BlazyBadge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Badge/BlazyBadge.razor): Small status indicators and labels
- [BlazyButton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Button/BlazyButton.razor): Interactive buttons with colors, sizes, and states
- [BlazyIndicator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Indicator/BlazyIndicator.razor): Notification badge overlay for elements
- [BlazyKbd](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Kbd/BlazyKbd.razor): Keyboard key styling for shortcuts
- [BlazyLoading](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Loading/BlazyLoading.razor): Loading spinners and skeleton animations
- [BlazyProgress](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Progress/BlazyProgress.razor): Progress bars with value indication
- [BlazySkeleton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Skeleton/BlazySkeleton.razor): Loading placeholder animations
- [BlazyStat](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Stat/BlazyStat.razor): Statistical displays with title and value
- [BlazyStatus](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Status/BlazyStatus.razor): Status dot indicators
- [BlazyTooltip](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Tooltip/BlazyTooltip.razor): Hover information tooltips


## Components - Dialogs/Overlays

- [BlazyModal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Modal/BlazyModal.razor): Dialog windows via IModalService
- [BlazyToast](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toast/BlazyToast.razor): Toast notifications via IToastService


## Components - Navigation

- [BlazyMenu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Menu/BlazyMenu.razor): Vertical menu with items and nested dropdowns
- [BlazySteps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Steps/BlazySteps.razor): Step-by-step navigation with color and direction support
